trans-unit.source: Flying, banding {R}: Nalathni Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability is played four or more times during this turn, sacrifice Nalathni Dragon at end of turn.
trans-unit.target: Flying, banding {R}: Nalathni Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability is played four or more times during this turn, sacrifice Nalathni Dragon at end of turn.

trans-unit.source: These small but intelligent Dragons and their Olesian allies held back the tide of Pashalik Mons's hordes of Goblin Raiders.\n*DragonCon 1994*
trans-unit.target: These small but intelligent Dragons and their Olesian allies held back the tide of Pashalik Mons's hordes of Goblin Raiders.\n*DragonCon 1994*
